story.iWant: to quickly update the stock levels for products
story.soThat: the online catalog accurately reflects physical inventory

tasks.task: Frontend UI for Quick Stock Update

acceptanceCriteria.criterion: From the product list or product edit page in the admin interface, I can easily modify the stock quantity for any product (FR016).
Changes to stock levels are immediately reflected in the customer-facing catalog.
The system prevents setting stock to a negative value.

file.reason: The product table will be updated to allow inline editing of the stock quantity.

constraints.constraint: The `products.stock_quantity` column should have a CHECK constraint to prevent negative numbers.

ideas.idea: Write an E2E test that edits a stock value directly in the admin table and verifies the change is persisted.
